item.description: Game Description 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far is a real-time strategy game developed by Petroglyph Games, a continuation of the 8-Bit Armies series. Gamers lead modern military forces across various battlefields, participating in land, sea and air battles. The project offers more than two dozen missions, online skirmishes and cooperative play. A base construction system has been implemented in which players build structures, unlock units and launch attacks. The game is designed for both new and experienced RTS players with an easy to learn interface but a challenging skill ceiling.

item.title: Rum and Gun
item.description: Game Description Rum and Gun uses a pirate theme as its setting. The hero travels through the lands located in the Indian Ocean, fighting on land with people and monsters. He is trying to stop the captain, who has enlisted the help of evil forces. He also has to learn the secrets of the Drunken God. The plot is presented with jokes and self-irony. History is divided into acts. This is an isometric shooter and action game with role-playing elements.

item.title: Before They Wake
item.description: Game Description Before They Wake takes place in the summer of 1984 and tells the story of Alfred, who is confined to a wheelchair. Trapped in an orphanage overrun by sound-sensitive mutants, Alfred navigates a path of survival and escape. His wheelchair squeaks with every movement, adding to the stress as he navigates the dangerous environment. The mechanics boil down to controlling the noise level so as not to attract the attention of mutants.

item.title: Selene's Unbearable Night
item.description: Game Description Selene’s Unbearable Night is a third-person survival horror game that immerses gamers in a tense and atmospheric atmosphere. The title tells the story of Selena, a woman who finds herself in a difficult situation and is forced to overcome various dangers in order to survive. Users will have to search for key items, solve complex puzzles and confront numerous threats in order to complete the game. Selene’s Unbearable Night’s narrative unfolds through dialogue and cinematography, offering a deep dive into the characters' motivations and backstories.

item.title: LightRay
item.description: Game Description LightRay is a top-down logic puzzle game that challenges gamers to solve a variety of puzzles related to lasers and the behavior of light. The action takes place in a calm environment, providing a calm backdrop as players work their way through over 40 puzzles. Each puzzle requires users to manipulate light and its colors to solve increasingly complex problems. The mechanics are simple, which makes it accessible to a wide range of gamers.

item.title: 3 Minutes to Midnight
item.description: Game Description 3 Minutes to Midnight is a casual indie adventure with all kinds of puzzles, filled with satire and parodies of modern society, humor (sometimes dark and rude) and unpredictable plot twists. This project uses a side view, which allows movement in two dimensions. The backgrounds are detailed and made in three-dimensional style. Control is available using a controller from any manufacturer for maximum convenience. The story campaign tells the story of a strange night explosion somewhere in Mexico that changed the life of a young girl named Betty Anderson.

item.title: Tactical Breach Wizards
item.description: Game Description Tactical Breach Wizards is a tactical role-playing adventure with an isometric camera that allows you to better assess the situation in the location to make the most successful decisions. The user will be transported to an alternative universe, where a distant futuristic future has arrived. The gamer takes control of a group of soldiers who have magical abilities that allow them to be combined with shots from firearms.

item.title: Who is Abby
item.description: Game Description Who is Abby begins with Tom, a man determined to find his missing sister. The title immerses users in an intense psychological thriller where mystery and exploration go hand in hand. With every step, Tom plunges deeper into the mystery of Abby’s disappearance, revealing a story shrouded in mystery and darkness. As you take on the role of Tom, the journey becomes personal, with each discovery adding another piece to the puzzle of Abby’s life.

item.title: shapez 2
item.description: Game Description Shapez 2 is a simulator about the construction of factories with a top view, in which you need to automate the process of processing geometric shapes. Players must build and optimize massive production facilities to solve increasingly complex logistics problems. Gameplay involves cutting, rotating, stacking, painting and delivering shapes to unlock advanced technologies and expand enterprise capabilities. What’s unique is that each object is a separate set of building blocks that can be disassembled, folded, painted and put back together in special ways.

item.title: Crime Scene Cleaner
item.description: Game Description Crime Scene Cleaner is an unusual simulator in which you clean up traces of a crime. As soon as the customer calls you, and usually this is the mafia boss, you need to rush to the crime scene and wield a brush, a mop and many other tools. If you find yourself in a room full of corpses and blood, pull yourself together and do the job professionally. Don’t give investigators a chance to find the killer.

item.title: Nova Drift
item.description: Game Description Nova Drift is a top-down action RPG adventure. The gamer has the opportunity to test his strength in piloting a space fighter, forced to fight enemies that are superior in numbers and firepower. The spaceship uses unusual technologies; it is created using biomechanics, which means that it seems to be alive and is constantly changing both in appearance and in terms of available weapons. Thanks to the addition of artificial intelligence trained in procedural random generation, the developers from a small indie formation were able to achieve almost endless replayability.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Into the Pit immerses players in time-bending horror. Oswald, bored with everyday life, stumbles upon a portal to the past in the ball pit of an old pizzeria. His desire for thrills quickly turns into a nightmare when he finds himself trapped in a deadly game of cat and mouse. The player will have to move between different eras, piece together clues and elude relentless animatronic pursuers.

item.title: Fields of Mistria
item.description: Game Description Fields of Mistria invites users to exchange the hustle and bustle for a charming life in the village of Mistria. Here the fields lie between a whispering forest and a sparkling sea. But in Mystria, not everything is so rosy and sunny. The recent earthquake has left its mark, and now there is a strange magic in the air. This is where you come to the rescue. In Mystria you inherit an overgrown estate - a diamond in the bowels of the earth.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: Nine Sols
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Nine Sols take players into an oriental fantasy setting where they will have to fight against 9 Sols. The game is a 2D platformer with soulslick elements, where you have to face unique bosses. Events take place on the territory of New Kunlun, which is a refuge for survivors. The ancient gods abandoned mortals, forcing them to confront dangerous monsters. A hero named Yi has arrived from the distant past to defeat mythological creatures.

item.title: WARNO
item.description: Game Description Tactical battles in WARNO take place in real time, where users will be able to take control of modern combat vehicles and go to the front, plunging into the Third World War. The game is made in the genre of strategy and army command simulator, where you need to think through the movement of units and observe the events taking place. The storyline is about a coup that occurs after Gorbachev leaves, creating a tense conflict between states in 1989.

item.title: ANIMAL WELL
item.description: Game Description In ANIMAL WELL players must explore a vast labyrinth created in pixel art. Players will interact with the interactive environment, pick up objects and combine them with each other, solve spatial puzzles, overcome landscape obstacles and much more. The character has to move around two-dimensional locations with a side view, periodically encountering dangerous monsters. It is necessary to illuminate dark areas on the map by lighting special candles.

item.title: Little Kitty, Big City
item.description: Game Description Little Kitty, Big City will help you learn about all the difficulties that street cats face. Despite the fact that animals seem to people to be foolish and unable to live without humans, they have their own hierarchy, connections, and they support communication between species. Often, even dogs and cats team up for common survival or give advice to new recruits. The main character is a teenage black kitten who got lost in a big city and now has to urgently find his way home.

item.title: Rabbit and Steel
item.description: Game Description Rabbit and Steel is a co-op action roguelike that will take you into epic battles. Choose your class, gather your bunny friends and fight to the top of Moon Peak. Months ago, all ties with the Moonlight Kingdom were severed. It is reported that the city’s residents are attacking all newcomers. Exploratory expeditions are repulsed or go missing. Every night, a huge white tower appears in the center of the city, reaching towards the stars.

item.title: Hades 2
item.description: Game Description Hades II, the sequel to the award-winning roguelike dungeon crawler, takes players beyond the underworld. You play as Melina, a princess of the underworld, who uses dark sorcery to fight the Titan of Time. Supergiant Games builds on the success of the original game with intense action and endless replayability. Explore a deeper mythical world rooted in Greek myth and witchcraft. The story unfolds through victories and failures, keeping you on your toes.

item.title: Chrono Ark
item.description: Game Description Chrono Ark is a classic Japanese-style RPG adventure that supports high-resolution textures, but uses similar camera views and turn-based dialogue and battle system rendering. The story campaign is available for completion only in single-player mode; multiplayer is not provided in this project. The gameplay is based on gathering a team, which includes 4 characters, for further leveling up and creating an invincible squad, ready to fight on equal terms with all opponents presented in the locations of the bizarre Distorted World.

item.title: Rusty's Retirement
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Retirement allows players to experience farming on the go. Designed as a project for idlers, it allows you to manage a virtual farm while doing other things. Gamers take on the role of Rusty, a retired robot who tends to his crops. The game develops automatically: Rusty plants, waters and harvests crops without constant player interaction. As you progress, you can discover new cultures, adding variety to your virtual fields.

item.title: Another Crab's Treasure
item.description: Game Description Another Crab’s Treasure is an exciting underwater adventure created by AGGRO CRAB. You take on the role of a hermit crab named Creel, who goes on a dangerous treasure hunt to get back his stolen shell. In this unique underwater kingdom, on the verge of destruction, garbage is not only part of life, but also a valuable resource used to create fashionable outfits and weapons. However, with the garbage comes a mysterious danger - “slurry” - which threatens to destroy the entire ocean.

item.title: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
item.description: Game Description The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty is a visual novel set in China during the turbulent reign of the Chongzhen Emperor. Players take on the role of Liang, a former merchant turned bandit tasked with escorting four girls to the prosperous city of Luoyang. The journey is fraught with danger and moral problems. Liang struggles with the truth behind his mission when one of the girls, Sui, reveals a terrifying secret: their goal is not a luxurious life, but an encounter with a monstrous pig demon.

item.title: Altushka for skufa
item.description: Game Description In the game Altushka for skufa the state provides a tart for skufa through a special service using personal data. For men who have reached forty years of age, do not have a wife and have a stable outlook on life, the project provides the opportunity to receive a legal altushka through the online service Skufuslugi, using the password from your account. The game is an immersive first-person scoof simulator created by comic artist Vitaly Terletsky and the author of viral anime videos RIKANI in a short time.

item.title: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
item.description: Game Description Spirit City: Lofi Sessions is not an ordinary adventure game. It combines game elements and practical tools to improve focus and reduce stress. You will find yourself in a virtual world filled with a variety of activities, the essence of which comes down to collecting and interacting with spirits. These aren’t just pretty additions to your virtual homes - they play an important role in achieving the goal of making you more productive.

item.title: The Lost Village
item.description: Game Description In The Lost Village you have to restore a once great sect. You take on the role of the heir to a leader who has returned to an abandoned mountain and is tasked with restoring it to its former glory. The game combines a management simulator with roguelike elements. Gamers will guide students by collecting resources, building structures and cultivating the land. Students have unique personalities and talents, allowing assignments to be specialized.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto of Buckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: Content Warning
item.description: Game Description Content Warning throws players into the world of horror content creation. Team up with friends, create your own pixelated face using the in-game ASCII customizer, and grab your gear. Then descend into the spooky Old World using the diving bell. The Old World is crawling with creepy, physics-based monsters and cursed relics just waiting to be captured on camera. Capture as much creepy content as you can before you run out of oxygen, your camera dies, or worse, your friends become fodder for the monsters.

item.title: Knowledge, or know Lady
item.description: Game Description Knowledge, or know Lady throws you into the heart of a unique dating simulator. As the only guy at an all-girl university, you’ll find yourself caught up in a whirlwind of romance and college life. Will you succumb to the charms of the beauties around you or forge your own path to become a campus legend? Ladies School Prince unfolds through your eyes, offering a first-person perspective. Your

item.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt
item.description: Game Description Midnight Ghost Hunt is a creepy version of hide and seek in which players will have to catch ghosts or, on the contrary, drive away people who disturbed the peace of the spirits. 4v4 confrontation takes place between friends or random users. The main task of the hunters is to catch all the evil spirits with the help of their equipment, and the ghosts are to kill all living things by any means.

item.title: Backpack Battles
item.description: Game Description Backpack Battles is a unique PvP game where everything depends on the contents of your backpack. Forget about deft kicking or pressing buttons - here, winning is achieved by assembling the perfect bag arsenal. The core gameplay revolves around purchasing and arranging items in your inventory. These items come in different shapes, sizes and rarities, presenting a strategic puzzle as you put them together for maximum effectiveness. Don’t limit yourself to simply stockpiling - by combining these items, you can unlock even more powerful equipment, such as brewing a potion or forging a legendary weapon.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description: Game Description Secrets of Grindea is an interesting adventure game in which you will need to take control of a hero and go on a long journey through a huge fantasy world in search of new adventures. The game begins with character generation. You will have to create it, change its appearance using an advanced editor, and then decide on the basic skills. After this, you can begin to explore the world around you.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Last Epoch
item.description: Game Description Last Epoch is an action-adventure game with a deep leveling system in a dark style, gameplay repeating the legendary Diablo. The camera view is also taken from there, it is isometric for a better overview of the surrounding areas. The story campaign for one person (multiplayer is not provided) invites you to explore the rich world of Eterra, with various picturesque places and dark dungeons. It contains many different oddities, secrets, many demons and other fiends of hell.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal of Myth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Supermarket Simulator puts you in the shoes of a retailer tasked with reviving abandoned grocery stores. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to breathe new life into forgotten stalls. First of all, assess the damage. Broken freezers? Leaky windows? Collapsing shelves? Throw away what’s irreparable and develop a repair strategy for the rest. Imagine a bright future filled with colorful products - this will become the basis of your renovation plan.

item.title: Balatro
item.description: Game Description Balatro - the word “poker” crackles with energy, whispering promises of high stakes and cunning deals. This poker roguelike beckons players into a deck-building odyssey where bluffing becomes the spell and chips become your lifeblood. Forget about limping into pots with low pairs. Here you create powerful synergies by weaving intricate combinations that unleash explosive power. Valid poker hands dance with unique wild cards, their abilities changing the course of the game like a magician.

item.title: Blaz Blue Entropy Effect
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue Entropy Effect is a 2D adventure game set in the BlazBlue universe, but with a different genre and style than previous fighting games. It features roguelite elements such as procedurally generated maps, permadeath, and character customization. There is also a rich plot with several endings, depending on the choice of the gamer. In the game you can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities and character.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description In Smalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: GU LONG FENGYUN LU
item.description: Game Description GU LONG FENGYUN LU is a massive martial arts RPG based on the classic works of Gu Long, the famous Chinese writer. The plot tells about the turbulent times of the end of the Ming Dynasty, when various heroes and factions fought for power and glory. The main character is Feng Yun, a young martial artist traveling across the country, encountering friends, enemies, love, hate, loyalty and betrayal.

item.title: Murders on the Yangtze River
item.description: Game Description Murders on the Yangtze River takes you to early 20th century China. Think “Ace Attorney” and historical detective. Channel your inner Sherlock Holmes as you unravel a series of mysterious cases along the banks of the legendary Yangtze River. Step into the shoes of John Shen, a law student turned detective. Grief and a thirst for justice force him to return to China after his brother’s mysterious death is ruled a suicide.

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description: Game Description Anomaly Agent is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that places players in the heart of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. As the titular character, Anomaly, players take on the role of an agent on a mission to investigate and eliminate temporary anomalies wreaking havoc on the city. The narrative unfolds gradually, revealing a complex web of interconnected areas with their own unique challenges and mysteries. At the core of Anomaly Agent’s appeal is its innovative combat system, which relies on Anomaly’s unique ability to manipulate time.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: The Universim
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city construction, the development of an entire planet and a ward civilization - The Universim is a short sand strategy in which you have to try on the role of God. The game begins with the fact that you settle several people on one of the planets, give them food, indicate what needs to be done - set priorities. And then watch how people develop on their own, without your help.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: KinitoPET
item.description: Game Description KinitoPET promises a world of endless fun and communication with your virtual assistant Kinito. This early 2000s wonder can walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games, making him a friend like no other. But beneath the surface of this seemingly perfect companion lies a disturbing truth. Step into “Eternal Fun!”, and Kinito will become your personal assistant, ready to fulfill your every request. Its cutting-edge technology promises a “truly unique experience” designed just for you.

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: SANABI
item.description: Game Description SANABI is a pixel action game with retro style and unique locations. The game takes place in the distant future, where cybernetic prosthetics have become the norm, even if the person has not lost a limb. After all, they can be equipped with various useful technical devices and overcome human abilities. But it has also become a convenient opportunity for criminals to gain easy access to sophisticated weapons.

item.title: Magicraft
item.description: Game Description Magicraft throws you into a world overrun by ancient gods. As a lone hero, you wield a legendary staff - your only hope for salvation. This roguelike focuses on spells that can be combined to create devastating effects. The developers themselves admit that the number of possibilities exceeds their own imagination! The game world is strange and whimsical, filled with unusual creatures and riddled with a ridiculous plot. Magicraft doesn’t take itself too seriously, but rather offers a light-hearted adventure with an emphasis on fun and flashy combat.

item.title: DON'T SCREAM
item.description: Game Description DON’T SCREAM is a thrilling indie horror game that plunges you into the heart of an eerie forest with a nerve-wracking twist: silence is the key to survival. The basic concept is simple, but fiendishly difficult: survive in a creepy forest for 18 minutes without letting out a single scream. An integral component of the game is a functional microphone, and any flash, scream or loud noise will result in the character’s untimely demise, causing an unfortunate restart.

item.title: Lethal Company
item.description: Game Description Lethal Company is a thrilling co-op horror game that plunges into the eerie depths of abandoned moons in a relentless pursuit of salvageable scrap metal. In the black reaches of space, players will find a menagerie of celestial bodies, alien life forms, and irreplaceable tools to find and use. The unique approach to gameplay ensures endless replayability, offering a variety of dangers and rewards depending on the chosen lunar expedition.

item.title: Slay the Princess
item.description: Game Description Slay the Princess is a dark and daring adventure that will put your skills to the ultimate test, combining the genres of psychological horror and dating simulator. Your mission is simple: kill the princess and save the world from destruction. But don’t be fooled by her charms and promises. She will stop at nothing to stop you from completing your task. Make your way through the dense forest and find the hut at the end of the path.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: Chants of Sennaar
item.description: Game Description Chants of Sennaar is an adventure game with peaceful gameplay, set in an incredibly beautiful universe. It is incredibly reminiscent of Ancient Babylon in the years of its dawn. In this fantasy world, there are several powerful ethnic groups and for a long time they interacted with each other and shared knowledge. These tribes call themselves the Peoples of the Tower and are gradually weakening every year due to hostility.

item.title: The Matchless KungFu
item.description: Game Description The Matchless KungFu immerses users in a world where martial arts are at the forefront. The gamer can choose the path of any warrior he likes and go on a journey through these lands. Be a loner or join a group of like-minded people - you can choose any convenient way. Only the decisions made will shape the character’s story, throwing him into different circumstances, giving him complete freedom of action in certain aspects.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Volcano Princess
item.description: Game Description Volcano Princess is a charming RPG that puts you in the role of a single parent raising a daughter in a kingdom blessed by a powerful goddess. But your daughter’s fate is in your hands, and you must make the right choices to prepare her for her future role as the country’s next monarch. After your wife left, you became the sole guardian of your child. Now you need to provide her with everything she needs to be happy and successful in school and everyday life.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
item.description: Game Description The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker is an immersive, atmospheric role-playing adventure that takes you into the fictional world of Imbertal. The game focuses on classic old-school mechanics, allowing you to venture into a dark and dangerous dark fantasy setting. The main character is a cursed lord named Rothar Aekrest, who must deal with problems on his land, facing various obstacles and participating in difficult combat encounters with monsters. When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Pizza Tower
item.description: Game Description Pizza Tower stands out with its pixel graphics and animation. The art imitates old cartoon series from the end of the last century. The project also boasts an energetic soundtrack. It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This title is the spiritual successor to the video games from the Wario Land series. In it you can walk left and right, run, accelerate, jump, make dashes, break some obstacles, ride mounts, and turn into monsters.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere in HELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging into ZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror film SIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in the Vampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: CULTIC
item.description: Game Description Death in CULTIC is the beginning of a mysterious path, so you shouldn’t be afraid of it. The player will have to muster up the courage to fight through hordes of perverted cultists in order to gain the upper hand in this battle. As the character progresses, he encounters hundreds of NPCs with completely frozen minds, who are guided by blind faith in their ideals. The cultists are further corrupted by an immortal and invisible entity that seeks sole domination of the world.

item.title: The Case of the Golden Idol
item.description: Game Description The Case of the Golden Idol will allow you to become detectives, but not in the modern world - but in the past. The events take place in the 18th century and mostly in an aristocratic society. The plot revolves around the murders of 12 people that occurred over a period of 40 years. During this time, law enforcement agencies were unable to find the suspect, and even moreover, they believe that these crimes are in no way connected with each other.

item.title: Trombone Champ
item.description: Game Description Trombone Champ is a humorous rhythm game with CCG elements. This is also an arcade simulator of playing the trombone. This title differs from other projects where you need to perform some actions in time with the music in that here you can play any notes at any time. This allows you to hear incorrectly played melodies and leads to all sorts of funny situations. A total of 20 famous melodies are available.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horror Escape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description In Cult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Dorfromantik
item.description: Game Description Dorfromantik - strategy in low-poly style. The game encourages you not to think about military strategies and operations. enjoy peaceful buildings and development of your lands. Game mechanics of Dorfromantic combine classic RTS and puzzle. Create a village, developing and expanding, building new buildings on hexagonal tiles. Explore a procedurally generated world filled with diverse and colorful biomes. Complete tasks to fill locations with new life and create truly unique worlds.

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description In Stacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Wobbledogs
item.description: Game Description Wobbledogs is a bright sandbox with simulation elements, based on funny physics and funny ragdoll. The gameplay is a pet simulator. Take care and raise fancy dogs. They can change shape and mutate. Acid colors, funny style and cute animals are the basis of such an unusual project. Wobbledogs helps you learn how to take care of your pets. At the beginning of their life, dogs behave relatively calmly and normally.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: Mon Bazou
item.description: Game Description While repairing a car in Mon Bazou, players have to deal with a variety of everyday problems that affect the life of the main character. The protagonist is a guy who dreams of turning his old car into a racing car that can compete with professional drivers and reach great speed. The game is made in the form of a simulator, where users have to take on the role of a novice racer who will live the everyday routine and do simple things, trying to earn a living.

item.title: Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description The narrative adventure Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of mil continues the story of the previous part. The player finds himself in a crazy and mysterious world filled with different combinations of unusual colors and surreal events. On a new journey, you will again have to help the young girl become a little happier. Initially she will be terrified, but as she progresses she will meet new people and realize her own dreams.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooter Gunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: The Last Campfire
item.description: Game Description The Last Campfire is a project from the studio that developed No Man’s Sky. It is made in cartoonish, bright graphics, each of the landscapes is unique and creates new details of the world. The story is presented in the genre of an adventure quest. The protagonist will be a coal shining with kindness. He got lost in the forest because a strong current knocked his boat off course and washed ashore.

item.title: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
item.description: Game Description Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya takes gamers to a fictional Japanese town called Gensoke, where the young and very charming owner of the local night izakaya lives. This term usually refers to a night drinking establishment where people gather, usually after a night shift, and drink alcoholic beverages. The protagonist is the beautiful Mistia Lorelei, who has a dream to make the entire establishment the most popular in the city.

item.title: MADNESS: Project Nexus
item.description: Game Description MADNESS: Project Nexus is a three-dimensional dynamic shooter with a side view, as well as a huge number of opponents and violence that happens on the monitor screen. The arcade controls are easy to remember, allowing you to quickly start enjoying the gameplay. This project from indie developers is a driving mixture of beat’em’up and slasher using not only melee weapons, but also firearms with different damage. The main feature of the gameplay is the ability to play cooperatively on one personal computer.

item.title: TOEM
item.description: Game Description TOEM is an adventure puzzle game made in black and white style. Go fancy. expedition, revealing the secrets of the magical world of TOEM. The visual style is made entirely in a hand-drawn monochrome manner. Meet funny characters and help solve their problems. Travel the world and take different photos. Puzzles revolve around exploring the environment and taking pictures. By taking a photo, you can find the answer to your question, thereby helping local animals with pressing problems.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story of Webbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Cookie Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cookie Clicker lives up to its name. This is a clicker about earning cookies. The title is considered one of the first such games. The project developed and popularized an entire genre. Initially it was a browser. Here is an improved version of Cookie Clicker. The re-release boasts an achievement system with 500 achievements, 600 improvements, the ability to exchange some goodies for others, and receiving constant upgrades. There are also mini-games here.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world of Subnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Before Your Eyes
item.description: Game Description Before Your Eye s will take users on an emotional journey from a first-person perspective. The player influences the plot with his own blinks, changing the story and actions. Innovative technology allows you to use a webcam to track the gamer’s blinks and interact with the virtual universe. Along the way you will encounter joyful and heartbreaking memories as your whole life flashes before your eyes. It all begins with the soul setting off on a journey through the afterlife.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: The Room 4: Old Sins
item.description: Game Description The Room 4: Old Sins is an adventure puzzle game inspired by the works of Lovecraft. The story begins with the disappearance of the chief engineer and his high-ranking wife. After this, the hunt for ancient artifacts begins. A chain of events leads to the attic of their mansion, where there is an old dollhouse… You have to explore a mystical toy mansion that is full of various rooms.

item.title: Firework
item.description: Game Description The dark journey of the boy in Firework allows gamers to find themselves in dangerous environments where they must survive and solve difficult puzzles. The game presents the opportunity to go investigate a mysterious fire that killed many people. The main character, named Lin Lixun, goes to explore the territory where the disaster occurred. In the process of clarifying the circumstances, the young policeman is forced to deal with mysterious phenomena and confusing facts that overlap with each other.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is an open world survival game where you build your own base and fight mythical creatures from Scandinavian folklore. The game takes place in Valheim, the tenth Viking world. The hero’s goal is to reach the gates of Valhalla. By killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit various corners of the world: dense forests, snow-capped mountains and much more.

item.title: Dyson Sphere Program
item.description: Game Description Dyson Sphere Program is a space simulator that allows you to develop your base and explore the galaxy. Go into the vastness of outer space to colonize distant planets. Build an intergalactic factory using the power of the stars. Design and plan production chains. Collect resources and develop your base. Start your journey as a small workshop and progress to the Dyson Sphere - a megastructure that orbits the stars.

item.title: OMORI
item.description: Game Description Two realities and only one is true in the game OMORI. A psychological history of surrealism with elements of thriller and horror. The protagonist will have to travel between two dimensions. They are similar, and at the same time radically different. Each reality has its own mysteries and secrets. Explore the new (old) world, make acquaintances with friendly characters who, in another reality, will immediately attack you. Explore the memories of your own path, and finally determine which world is the real reality for you, and which is the other world.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Phasmophobia
item.description: Game Description Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. The plot is built around paranormal phenomena, where a group of researchers is trying to prove with the help of special equipment that spirits and ghosts exist. You have to collect as much evidence as possible to find out what type of evil entity you are dealing with. Having studied the strengths and weaknesses of otherworldly forces, begin to expel demons.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelike Hades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk is a short visual novel with a deep message and unusual execution, made by the efforts of one developer, one of the indie creators. The visual design of the single-player campaign, which is the only game mode, is made using only two colors - purple and black. For completing a short story, which will take about 15 minutes, the developer has prepared three rewards, implementing a small list of achievements.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut
item.description: Game Description Disco Elysium is an RPG in which a detective must use his skills to conduct a unique investigation. The player will have to interrogate well-developed characters, investigate murders, and, if desired, take bribes. You can become either the savior of the city or the worst disaster for all humanity. Game Features: Unique branched dialogue system. Wide freedom of choice both in the story narrative and in additional tasks. Well-developed characters with their own stories and personalities.

item.title: Kind Words (lo fi chill beats to write to)
item.description: Game Description Kind Words (lo fi chill beats to write to) is a casual indie game that taps into a variety of human feelings and emotions to create a memorable adventure with relaxing gameplay that creates a good mood. The user will have to write letters to random people, with or without reason, to provide support or for the purpose of dialogue on abstract topics for the sake of self-development and broadening his horizons.

item.title: A Short Hike
item.description: Game Description A Short Hike is an adventure game designed to provide a true sense of exploration and enjoy the vibrant scenery of the mountain town of Hawk Peak. The plot is extremely simple - the main character wants to climb the highest mountain. Starting your journey from a small settlement at the very foot of the mountain, you have to overcome a long and eventful path, full of obstacles and dangers.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task in Oxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: People Playground
item.description: Game Description People Playground is an indie game, a kind of murder simulator in different ways. Here you can simply drag mannequins of creatures across the screen and throw them from a height, or create dangerous situations with your own hands - accidents, torture chambers, obstacle courses. There are 5 types of creatures available for destruction: a fragile person, a heavier and stronger robot, a gorse (spider), a regular and improved turret.

item.title: Beat Saber
item.description: Game Description A musical game designed for the good taste of the player Beat Saber. The levels are a small interactive location where blocks of 2 colors fly towards the player. The player must cut these blocks. The difficulty of the game is that the number of blocks and the method of destruction are always different. For example, in some levels you will have to chop them with a sword of a certain color, in others you will have to hit them from the right side.

item.title: MORDHAU
item.description: Game Description MORDHAU is a hack and slash game. Fights take place online on the company’s servers; offline you can train your skills in fights against artificial intelligence. A training session is also available, in which you will learn the basic mechanics and get your initial gold capital. The name refers to a special German grip on the weapon, which, by the way, is available for selection. The main, but not the only feature is a fencing system that is as close to reality as possible, created through consultations with experts.

item.title: Katana ZERO
item.description: Game Description Katana ZERO is an extraordinary and dynamic platformer in the genre of science fiction and action, created in the best traditions of pixel graphics. The plot of the game tells us about a dystopian city, the main character lives in the third quarter, his name is Zero. He was severely wounded in the war, causing him to lose his memory. At night he has nightmares about past battles, and during the day he has to visit a psychotherapist.

item.title: Unheard
item.description: Game Description Unheard is a well-developed detective simulator with many implemented mechanics aimed at allowing the player to understand the crimes committed in various ways. A team of indie developers worked on the project, with a rather unusual idea and implementation, who decided to use the setting of detective fiction, because the protagonist uses devices that are not available in the real world. The devices make it possible to establish some kind of invisible connection between criminals and lawmen.

item.title: Baba Is You
item.description: Game Description Baba Is You is a game in the popular puzzle genre. The project, developed by indie programmer Hempuli Oi, uses pixel graphics and a camera positioned high above, which creates conditions for greater visibility around the protagonist for faster response to changes. The single-player campaign is divided into 200 separate levels with increasing difficulty, introducing much more intricate puzzles on the way to the final scene, and the use of new mechanics.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of Space Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Touhou Luna Nights
item.description: Game Description Touhou Luna Nights is a platformer that immerses you in the atmosphere of gothic mysticism. The main character is Sakuya Izaei, who works as a senior maid for the vampire Remilia Scarlet. The girl was calmly doing housework when the mistress deprived her of her powers and sent her to the “Magical Space.” Sakuya is looking for her way home and is eager to find out what her treacherous boss is up to.

item.title: Slay the Spire
item.description: Game Description In Slay the Spire the main task of the gamer is to climb to the upper levels of a tower consisting of many rooms. During the passage, you can have one of 4 characters, collect a collection of cards, defeat intermediate enemies and defeat the main villain. The locations and forks of the tower are constantly changing, the whole process can be divided into three acts and at the end of each of them the main character must defeat the local boss.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: GRIS
item.description: Game Description GRIS is a standard platformer, made entirely in bed colors and a constant atmosphere of suffering of the human soul, capturing the reality of pain and the entire oppressive existence. The personification of everything bad lies in the perception of the girl Gris. She is naive, so she suffered a lot in her life. The heroine’s power lies in her dress, which gives her unique abilities. One element of a woman’s wardrobe can replace the protagonist’s entire world in the forge of pain.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: DUSK
item.description: Game Description DUSK is a canonical first-person shooter created in a retro style. The plot is quite simple and clear - there is a small town called DUSK, in its vicinity ruins were discovered that have mystical properties. Many scientists and soldiers came here, studying strange objects and everyone gradually went crazy. They became possessed, and the government surrounded the entire area with a wall. A brave hero was found who entered the forbidden territory in search of these unique artifacts, but was captured by occultists and hung on hooks.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Return of the Obra Dinn
item.description: Game Description Return of Obra Dinn is an incredibly challenging game that will take over your head and drive you crazy for days. The quest in the game is made in 1-bit graphics, where reflection and logic are a priority. Despite the fact that the game’s graphics are too primitive, the developer was able to make it varied, depicting many objects, capturing the lives of the heroes and giving us half-valued 50-60 hours of gameplay if we find absolutely everything.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player in RimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: Dead Cells
item.description: Game Description A stunning rogue-like platformer with metroidvania elements - Dead Cells - features a real fight between the hero and constantly changing levels on the territory of the castle. Our hero is a creature who is trying to get out of the castle’s maze. He will try over and over again to cope with constantly generated opponents. But in random places on the map you will find many weapons with random characteristics.

item.title: House Flipper
item.description: Game Description A renovation crew simulator in which you take on the role of the boss and the only employee - House Flipper - allows you to destroy beautiful houses, but build beautiful apartments with amazing renovations in their place. In this game you can make rooms the way you see them in your life. The game also encourages you to use the latest repair tools, but one thing remains unchanged: you’ll have to take down walls with a sledgehammer!

item.title: The Forest
item.description: Game Description A survival simulator on an inhabited island - The Forest - was made in graphics that were new for that time, opening up completely ambiguous gameplay for the protagonist. We play as a character who finds himself on an inhabited island and now must survive under any conditions. Attacking cannibal natives, animals, lack of food, water and shelter - these are all just little things. A plane crashed not far from your island, and you are the only survivor in these conditions.

item.title: Mirror
item.description: Game Description Mirror is a visual novel that perfectly combines erotic content, an RPG component, an interactive plot and battles in which you take a direct part. The whole game is built on the “three in a row” principle. In the casual combination of characters, you will only take part in the battle on the Match 3 battlefield. That is, you will win if you can score more points. The game features three heroines who will oppose you throughout the game.

item.title: Pure Rock Crawling
item.description: Game Description Pure Rock Crawling is an SUV simulator, the main concept of which is built around a realistic simulation of tires and suspension. The developers set a goal to create the most realistic ride on rocky paths, deserts, hills, etc. A meditative ride through the stones is one of the best ways to experience the adventure of the wild lands of the entire planet. At first glance, the task in Pure Rock Crawling is extremely simple: drive through 10 gates consisting of cones to get along a designated route from one point on the map to another.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot of Kingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Celeste
item.description: Game Description Madeline must climb Celeste . No one knows why she needs this, but the characters around her gradually reveal this secret to us. The game is a complex platformer that combines a storyline, pixel graphics, character leveling and aspects of human existence buried in dialogue scripts. The heroine will fight with ghosts in abandoned cities, with her demons while she walks into the wasteland; will explore the secret corners of his soul while learning a new location and ways to climb the mountain more painlessly.

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Game Description In the world of Subnautica, your ship has crashed in an oceanic area, and there is only one straight line - down to the bottom. The landscapes around you are illuminated by the sun, the coral reefs shimmer beautifully under the sun as you slowly sink towards the endless darkness of space. Exploring a huge open world allows you not only to plunge under the water and look at the inhabitants of this ocean, but also to build your own underwater base there and build a research center on it.

item.title: Finding Paradise
item.description: Game Description In the pixel quest Finding Paradise with an isometric space, there is a corporation - Sigmund Corp. Special agents - Eva Rosalin and Neil Watts - became participants in the realization of the dream of one of the people - Colin Reeds. This man is dying, so our heroes undertake to make his last wishes come true. Arriving at his house, you see how doctors prepare his body and brain, connecting Colin to a special machine that allows you to plunge into his memories and find yourself in an interactive virtual reality.

item.title: Gorogoa
item.description: Game Description An entertaining puzzle quest, made in a non-standard genre for a computer game. While playing Gorogoa, the player must match images on the screen in a 2x2 grid, where each image has some kind of animated meaning or message. Thus, you create a whole picture that moves you towards the development of the plot, but does not reveal the main message until the very end. The plot reveals to us a certain boy who goes through his whole life in these pictures, so Gorogoa can be called a philosophical parable in which the protagonist will grow up, look at the world differently, and after that he will grow old and begin to reflect on the past.

item.title: A Hat in Time
item.description: Game Description In the 3D platformer A Hat in Time we will have to play as a girl who both looks and is called Hat Girl. She goes on an interplanetary journey to return home, but ends up in the city of the Mafia. At this location, a Mafioso gets into our ship and completely inspects the ship, but after checking, he scatters “time particles”, and then spreads them throughout the entire Mafia planet.

item.title: Cuphead
item.description: Game Description In Cuphead we choose one of two heroes and set off to conquer a world that looks like very old cartoons, with tons of weapons, special moves and immortality. A classic, in the truest sense of the word, platformer, in which everything is set in the world of the 1930s. The music is jazz accompaniment, the graphics are standard Disney of the time, and the bosses are neither good nor evil.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world of ARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous.
